title: Chicago -- If You Leave Me Now
description:
Imagine you&#039;re a shlub working for Columbia records and you have this old, in-the-way band named Chicago taking up space and so you jettison them making you look like the smartest boy in the block.  Then they go to another label and have two multi-platinum albums, making you look like an idiot.  What do you do?

The answer -- release a compilation album that&#039;s really really really like Chicago IX but has the band&#039;s biggest seller added along with a couple of others.


This album contains:


If You Leave Me Now

Saturday In the Park

Feelin&#039; Stronger Every Day

(I&#039;ve Been)  Searchin&#039; So Long

25 or 6 to 4

Baby, What a Big Surprise

Wishing You Were Here

No Tell Lover

Another Rainy Day in New York City

Does Anybody Really Know What Time It Is

Song For You


Thanks!
